name: Partisant
ability: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If they die at night (once), an evil player dies. The Demon knows a Partisant is in play.
flavor: You can kill the revolutionary, but never the revolution!
firstNightReminder:
Show the Townsfolk character token marked KNOWN.
Wake the Demon. Show the Partisant token.
otherNightReminder: If the KNOWN player died tonight, an evil player dies.
